medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Ten months prior to the clinic visit, the patient experienced an episode of substernal pain lasting nine hours. Six weeks before the visit, he developed exertional dyspnea, fatigue, and lost 5 to 7 kg in weight. A new systolic murmur was noted at that time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV infection diagnosed six years prior with previous Pneumocystis carinii pneumonia. No history of hypertension or diabetes mellitus. The patient had a 20-pack-year smoking history, cocaine use in the past, and alcohol consumption of two drinks nightly.
medical_history.family_history: Father underwent coronary bypass at age 53.
medical_history.social_history: Sedentary occupation; past cocaine use 13 years prior; 20-pack-year smoking history, ceased smoking 4 months earlier; occasional marijuana use. Alcohol consumption of two drinks nightly.
